content: your bookshelf deserves a mascot how about a free crochet pattern for the most charming bookworm bookends ever these whimsical diy bookends will add personality humor and handmade magic to any bookshelf pattern includes video tutorial > this pattern is part of the free live > book lover s mystery crochet along 2026 1 to > make crochet projects that are perfect for book lovers > for your loved ones or yourself this is > only 1 of the 50 patterns in the > book lover s mystery crochet along > but only 6 patterns will be made > available for free on nicki s homemade > crafts with ads pattern is free with ads on my website > and the only way to get all 50 > patterns ad-free and printer-friendly > is in the **ebook** the **ebook** > will be on sale until february 14th > 2025 **the code book15 will save you $15 between february 2nd and 14th > 2026 ** then the price will go back > up to the regular price so take > advantage if you want to get all the > patterns even ad-free and > printer-friendly >**get the ebook here 2 ** > but you can also purchase the ad-free > printer-friendly pdf here on ravelry > this pattern can also be found in out > membership the crochet club which includes over > 500 patterns and 100s of video > tutorials you can get more info and join the membership here 3 1 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/book-lover-mystery-crochet-along/ 2 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet-book-lover-patterns-made-easy/ 3 https //www nickishomemadecrafts com/crochet/the-crochet-club/
